job.remarks:
1. Generate sales orders in 400 for purchase orders in 484 for Orlaco Products 2. Generate purchase orders in 484 for sales invoices created in 400 for Orlaco Inc.
60 minutes

step.stepname: ==== Create purchase invoice on sales invoice

step.datasource:
INSERT INTO [ABSC_Data].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ABEI_Invoice_Sync]
---- ---- LET OP: DIT DRAAIT LOS VAN DE EERSTE STAP, ---- BACO IS NODIG OMDAT BIJ HET AANMAKEN VAN DE FACTUUR DIRECT OOK DE BIJLAGE MOET WORDEN GEKOPPELD ---- ( [AOS_id] ,[purchase_ordernr] ,[sales_ordernr] ,[sales_faknr] ,[sales_docnumber] ,[invoicedate] ,[orderreferenceid] ,[linereferenceid] ,[runid1] ,[rowstatus1] ,[rowmessage1] ,[retrycounter1] ,[runid2] ,[rowstatus2] ,[rowmessage2] ,[retrycounter2] ,[sysmodified] ,[syscreated] ,[baid] )
SELECT [S].ID --[AOS_id] ,[S].[purchase_ordernr] collate database_default ,[S].[sales_ordernr] collate database_default ,[SalesF].faknr --[sales_faknr] ,[SalesF].docnumber --[sales_docnumber] ,[SalesF].fakdat -- invoicdate ,NULL --[orderreferenceid] ,NULL --[linereferenceid] ,'%runid%' --[runid1] ,1 --[rowstatus1] ,'' --[rowmessage1] ,0 --[retrycounter1] ,NULL --[runid2] ,0 --[rowstatus2] ,'' --[rowmessage2] ,0 --[retrycounter2] ,GETDATE() --[sysmodified] ,GETDATE() --[syscreated] ,[SalesB].ID --[baid]
-- SELECT S.* , [SalesB].ID , [SalesF].*
FROM [ABSC_Data].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ABEI_Order_Sync] AS [S] INNER JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.frhkrg AS [SalesF] with (nolock) ON [SalesF].ordernr = [S].sales_ordernr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT -- > 100 INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.orkrg AS [PurchaseH] with (nolock) on [PurchaseH].ordernr = [S].purchase_ordernr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT --> 184 INNER JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.bacodiscussions AS [SalesB] with (nolock) on [SalesB].id = [SalesF].DocAttachmentID AND [SalesB].[OurRef] = [SalesF].faknr -- > 100
where [PurchaseH].ord_soort = 'B' AND [PurchaseH].crdnr = 151048 AND [SalesB].type = '14' AND [SalesF].fakdat > '2022-09-19' -- live date AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [ABSC_Data].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ABEI_Invoice_Sync] AS [IS] WITH(nolock) WHERE 1 = 1 AND [IS].[sales_faknr] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT = [SalesF].[faknr])
UNION --- include invoices not in order sync
SELECT -1 as ID --[AOS_id] ,[purchaseh].ordernr ,[salesf].ordernr ,[SalesF].faknr --[sales_faknr] ,[SalesF].docnumber --[sales_docnumber] ,[SalesF].fakdat -- invoicdate ,NULL --[orderreferenceid] ,NULL --[linereferenceid] ,'%runid%' --[runid1] ,1 --[rowstatus1] ,'' --[rowmessage1] ,0 --[retrycounter1] ,NULL --[runid2] ,0 --[rowstatus2] ,'' --[rowmessage2] ,0 --[retrycounter2] ,GETDATE() --[sysmodified] ,GETDATE() --[syscreated] ,[SalesB].ID --[baid]
-- SELECT S.* , [SalesB].ID , [SalesF].*
FROM [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.frhkrg AS [SalesF] with (nolock) INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.orkrg AS [PurchaseH] with (nolock) on [PurchaseH].ordernr = SalesF.docnumber COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT --> 184 INNER JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.bacodiscussions AS [SalesB] with (nolock) on [SalesB].id = [SalesF].DocAttachmentID AND [SalesB].[OurRef] = [SalesF].faknr -- > 100
WHERE [PurchaseH].ord_soort = 'B' AND [PurchaseH].crdnr = 151048 AND [SalesB].type = '14' AND [SalesF].fakdat > '2022-09-19' -- live date AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [ABSC_Data].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ABEI_Invoice_Sync] AS [IS] WITH(nolock) WHERE 1 = 1 AND [IS].[sales_faknr] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT = [SalesF].[faknr]) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [ABSC_Data].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ABEI_Order_Sync] AS [OS] WITH(nolock) WHERE 1 = 1 AND [OS].sales_ordernr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT = [SalesF].ordernr and OS.purchase_ordernr IS NOT NULL)
step.stepname: ... Controleer of de inkoop factuur al bestaat [100:184]

step.datasource:
SELECT [S].[sales_faknr] as HeaderID ,151048 as crdnr ,'16' as dagbknr --,CONVERT(varchar(10),CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,120) as datum ,invoicedate as datum ,[S].[sales_faknr] as docnumber ,concat([S].[sales_ordernr] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT, ' - ', [S].[sales_docnumber] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT ) as oms25 ,CONCAT('538/220/H/',[S].[sales_faknr] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT) as ReferenceKey
FROM [ABSC_Data].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ABEI_Invoice_Sync] AS [S] WITH(nolock)
WHERE 1=1 AND [S].[rowstatus1] = 1 AND [S].[runid1] = '%runid%'

SELECT [SalesH].faknr as HeaderID ,151048 as crdnr ,[SalesFL].regel ,[PurchaseI].itemcode as artcode ,2400 as reknr ,[SalesFL].esr_aantal as aantal ,[SalesFL].pr_bedr as bedrag -- ,[FH].docnumber as ordernumber ,[PurchaseH].ordernr as ordernumber
,[IS].baid AS docattachmentid
,CONCAT('538/220/L/',[SalesH].faknr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT) as ReferenceKey
FROM [%prm_ABSC_Data%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ABEI_Invoice_Sync] AS [IS] WITH(nolock) INNER JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.frhkrg AS [SalesH] with (nolock) ON [SalesH].[ordernr] = [IS].[sales_ordernr] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT AND [SalesH].[faknr] = [IS].[sales_faknr] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT -- 100 source INNER JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.frhsrg AS [SalesFL] with (nolock) on [SalesFL].faknr = [SalesH].faknr -- 100 source
LEFT JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.items AS [PurchaseI] with (nolock) on [PurchaseI].itemcode = [SalesFL].artcode -- 184 Target INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.orkrg [PurchaseH] with (nolock) on [PurchaseH].ordernr = [IS].[purchase_ordernr] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT -- 184 Target INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy [PurchaseC] with (nolock) on [PurchaseH].crdnr = [PurchaseC].crdnr -- 184 Target
WHERE 1=1 AND [PurchaseI].[Type] IN ('S') AND [IS].[rowstatus1] = 1 AND [IS].[runid1] = '%runid%'
-- Type description -- B Bulk issue -- C Contract -- L Labor hour -- M Machine hour -- P Phantom -- R Reason codes -- S Standard

UPDATE [S] SET [rowstatus1] = ISNULL([OA_ER].rowstatus,-1) ,[rowmessage1] = ISNULL([OA_ER].errormessage,'Onbekende fout')
,[rowstatus2] = CASE WHEN ISNULL([OA_ER].rowstatus,-1) = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ,[runid2] = CASE WHEN ISNULL([OA_ER].rowstatus,-1) = 2 THEN [S].[runid1] ELSE NULL END
,[sysmodified] = getdate()
-- SELECT [OA_ER].*, [S].* FROM [%prm_ABSC_Data%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ABEI_Invoice_Sync] AS [S]
OUTER APPLY ( SELECT TOP (1) [R].rowstatus ,[R].NewKeyvalue ,[R].errormessage ,[R].runid ,[R].id FROM [%abeidb%].[DBO].[_AB_Entity_results] AS [R] WITH(nolock) WHERE 1 = 1 AND [R].Entity = 'FinancialHeader' AND [R].Action = 'create' AND [R].runid = [S].[runid1] AND [R].ReferenceValue = CONCAT('538/220/H/',[S].[sales_faknr] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT) ) AS [OA_ER]
WHERE 1 = 1 AND [S].[rowstatus1] = 1 AND [S].[runid1] = '%runid%'

Select [SalesB].ID AS ID ,[SalesB].[filename] AS BinaryFileName ,[SalesB].[Document] AS BinaryDocument ,'Attachments' AS Category ,'artlnk' AS SubCategory ,7 AS Type ,'I' AS Source ,[PurchaseC].cmp_wwn AS cmpwwn ,[SalesB].[OurRef] AS Ourref -- (faktuurnummer) ,[SalesB].[Yourref] AS YourRef -- (docnumber) ,[SalesB].[subject] AS subject ,[IS].purchase_ordernr AS Ordernumber --,x.sysguid AS Entrykey --,[C].cmp_name
,CONCAT('538/310/B/',[IS].ID) as ReferenceKey FROM [%prm_ABSC_Data%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ABEI_Invoice_Sync] AS [IS] WITH(nolock) INNER JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[BacoDiscussions] AS [SalesB] WITH (nolock) ON [SalesB].ID = [IS].[BAID] -- 100 source = verkoop
INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].[dbo].[ORKRG] AS [PurchaseH] WITH(nolock) ON [PurchaseH].ordernr = [IS].purchase_ordernr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT -- 184 target = inkoop INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].[dbo].[cicmpy] AS [PurchaseC] WITH(nolock) ON [PurchaseC].crdnr = [PurchaseH].crdnr -- 184 target = inkoop
WHERE 1 = 1 AND [IS].rowstatus2 = 1 AND [IS].runid2 = '%runid%'

UPDATE [IS] SET [rowstatus2] = ISNULL([OA_ER].rowstatus,-1) ,[rowmessage2] = ISNULL([OA_ER].errormessage,'Onbekende fout') ,[sysmodified] = getdate()
-- SELECT [OA_ER].*, [IS].* FROM [%prm_ABSC_Data%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ABEI_Invoice_Sync] AS [IS]
OUTER APPLY ( SELECT TOP (1) [R].rowstatus ,[R].NewKeyvalue ,[R].errormessage ,[R].runid ,[R].id FROM [%abeidb%].[DBO].[_AB_Entity_results] AS [R] WITH(nolock) WHERE 1 = 1 -- AND [R].Entity = 'FinancialHeader' -- AND [R].Action = 'create' AND [R].runid = [IS].[runid2] AND [R].ReferenceValue = CONCAT('538/310/B/',[IS].ID) ) AS [OA_ER]
WHERE 1 = 1 AND [IS].[rowstatus2] = 1 AND [IS].[runid2] = '%runid%'

SELECT TOP 1000 [IS].[purchase_ordernr] AS [purchase_ordernr] ,[IS].[sales_ordernr] AS [sales_ordernr] ,CONCAT( [IS].[rowmessage1]COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT , ' / ' , [IS].[rowmessage2] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT) AS [message] ,GETDATE() AS [syscreated] ,[SalesB].[Document] ,[SalesB].[Filename] ,sales_faknr as InvoiceNr
FROM [ABSC_Data].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ABEI_Invoice_Sync] AS [IS] WITH(nolock) LEFT JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[BacoDiscussions] AS [SalesB] WITH(nolock) ON [SalesB].OrderNumber = [IS].[sales_ordernr] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT and type = 14
where 1 = 1 and ([IS].[rowstatus1] < 0 OR [IS].[rowstatus2] < 0) and [IS].[runid1] = '%runid%'
order by [IS].sysmodified desc
step.contentbody:
Geachte lezer,

Voor de onderstaande verkooporders zijn  geen inkoopfacturen aangemaakt. De inkoopfacturen zullen nog moeten worden aangemaakt:




purchase_ordernrsales_ordernrmessagesyscreatedInvoiceNr
%purchase_ordernr%%sales_ordernr%%message%%syscreated%%InvoiceNr%
 


Met vriendelijke groet,

De ABEI mailer

Basis gegevens:
RunID: %runid%
Tijd: %abei_now_121%
Server: %abeiserver% \ %jobid% \ %jobstepid%
step.settings: retryunique=0;uniquekey=;emailfrom=abei@orlaco.com;emailname=ABEI @ ES01;emailreplyto=lennart.meeuse@stoneridge.com;emailuser=;emailpwd=TFEEY7QNB86Yzc1ll50jtg%equalchar%%equalchar%;emailserver=smtpinternal.stoneridge.com;emailport=25;emailssl=False;emailto=lennart.meeuse@stoneridge.com%semicolon%ap@orlaco.com;emailcc=;emailbcc=;emailsub=Er gaat wat fout bij het aanmaken van de inkoop factuur;emailbodyusesource=0;emailsendifnoresults=0;emailcontentcolumns=purchase_ordernr,sales_ordernr,message,syscreated,InvoiceNr;mex_connectionid=0;

step.datasource:
SELECT TOP 1000 [IS].[purchase_ordernr] AS [purchase_ordernr] ,[IS].[sales_ordernr] AS [sales_ordernr] ,CONCAT( [IS].[rowmessage1]COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT , ' / ' , [IS].[rowmessage2] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT) AS [message] ,GETDATE() AS [syscreated] ,[SalesB].[Document] ,[SalesB].[Filename]
FROM [ABSC_Data].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ABEI_Invoice_Sync] AS [IS] WITH(nolock) LEFT JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[BacoDiscussions] AS [SalesB] WITH(nolock) ON [SalesB].OrderNumber = [IS].[sales_ordernr] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT and type = 14
where 1 = 1 and ([IS].[rowstatus1] < 0 OR [IS].[rowstatus2] < 0) and [IS].[runid1] = '%runid%'
order by [IS].sysmodified desc
step.contentbody:
Geachte lezer,

Voor de onderstaande verkooporders zijn  geen inkoopfacturen aangemaakt. De inkoopfacturen zullen nog moeten worden aangemaakt:







purchase_ordernrsales_ordernrmessagesyscreated
%purchase_ordernr%%sales_ordernr%%message%%syscreated%
 



Met vriendelijke groet,

De ABEI mailer

Tijd: %abei_now_121%
